Package org.bsf.smartValueObject.mediator

Mediator services for SVO.

Interface Summary
Mediator The mediator interface.

Class Summary
ChangeSummary Encapsulates changes made by updateGraph.

HibernateMediator Mediator for Hibernate.
 

Exception Summary
ConcurrencyException Thrown in case of concurrent modifications.
MediatorException Exceptions caused by a mediator.
